page.title: 19Steam Rally in Hunton
page.content: It is a fine September morning in Hunton.There is an unusually expectant and busy atmosphere. Veteran cars and motor bikes,old steam engines and farm machinery have already assembled in the fields behind Manor House Farm. It is our first ever "Steam Rally Day!" Numerous volunteer ladies have provided food for the produce and cake stalls and afternoon teas. Morrismen are keen to dance. Local men and women are ready to show their skills at lace making, woodturning, machine knitting and painting. Work begins on engraving glass,plaiting corn dollies or carving walking sticks. Children will flock to the mini_motor bikes,shooting gallery, horse rides or bouncy castle. Parents will try their hand at wellie throwing or quoits on the three pitches. The stage is set for a successful and happy day.
